resources.string:
Hi, my name is Andrés 

I love fish 

The kind that is alive and swimming around in an aquarium or river, or lake, and definitely the ocean. 
Fun facts is that I have several aquariums and also a river. 

I like eating fish too. Row fish, grilled fish, smoked fish, and all kind of fish in existence. 
Sometimes I even go fishing. 
Even less sometimes, I catch something. 

Once when I was camping in Canada, and very hungry, I even caught a very very large salmon. 

I'll be happy to teach how to make your own aquarium. 
You should ask someone else about fishing though.
